tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication, user registration, and password management

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Organization management, projects, and team members

tags.name: Project
tags.description: Project lifecycle, branches, and endpoint management

tags.name: Branch
tags.description: Branch operations, commits, reverts, and merges

tags.name: Revision
tags.description: Revision snapshots, tables, rows, and change history

tags.name: Table
tags.description: Table schema and row CRUD operations within a revision

tags.name: Row
tags.description: Individual row operations, data updates, and file uploads

tags.name: Endpoint
tags.description: API endpoint configuration for GraphQL and REST access

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the project was created

name.description: URL-friendly project name (lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens)

endCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the last item. Use as "after" parameter for next page.

hasNextPage.description: Whether more items exist after the current page

hasPreviousPage.description: Whether items exist before the current page

startCursor.description: Cursor pointing to the first item

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the branch was created

isRoot.description: Whether this is the root (default) branch of the project. Each project has exactly one root branch.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the revision was created

isDraft.description: Whether this is the draft revision. Draft revisions can be modified; use for all write operations.

isHead.description: Whether this is the head (latest committed) revision. Head is immutable and represents the published state.

id.description: Timestamp when the table was removed (ISO 8601)
Timestamp when the table was renamed (ISO 8601)
Timestamp when the update was applied (ISO 8601)

tableId.description: Identifier of the newly created table

id.description: Timestamp when the table was created (ISO 8601)

schema.description: JSON Schema definition of the table

createdId.description: Original table identifier when first created

id.description: Current table identifier (may differ from createdId if renamed)

versionId.description: Internal version identifier. Changes when table schema or data is modified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the table was first created

readonly.description: Whether the table is read-only (true in committed revisions, false in draft)

error.description: Error message if the migration failed

path.description: Path in JSON (PostgreSQL: array of keys/indexes, e.g. ["pet1","petName"] or dot notation "pet1.petName")

mode.description: Case sensitivity mode for string filters within JSON ("insensitive" uses ILIKE on PostgreSQL)

string_contains.description: Substring match in JSON string value

string_starts_with.description: Prefix match in JSON string value

string_ends_with.description: Suffix match in JSON string value

array_contains.description: Filter on arrays: target JSON array must contain *all* of these values

array_starts_with.description: JSON value that the target JSON array must start with (could be object, array, primitive)

array_ends_with.description: JSON value that the target JSON array must end with (could be object, array, primitive)

lt.description: Less-than comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

lte.description: Less-than-or-equal comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

gt.description: Greater-than comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

gte.description: Greater-than-or-equal comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

search.description: Full-text search string for JSON content

searchLanguage.description: Language for full-text search. Default: simple

searchType.description: Search type: plain (individual words), phrase (exact phrase), prefix (word beginnings with :*), tsquery (raw PostgreSQL tsquery syntax)

searchIn.description: Scope of search within JSON structure

field.description: The field name where the formula error occurred

error.description: The error message describing what went wrong

defaultUsed.description: Whether a default value was used instead of the computed result

createdId.description: Original row identifier when first created

id.description: Current row identifier (may differ from createdId if renamed)

versionId.description: Internal version identifier. Changes when row data is modified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the row was first created

publishedAt.description: Timestamp when the row was first published (committed). Null if never committed.

readonly.description: Whether the row is read-only (true in committed revisions, false in draft)

data.description: Row data matching the table schema

formulaErrors.description: Formula field errors that occurred during computation. Only present if there are errors.

op.description: The operation to perform. Currently only "replace" is supported

path.description: JSON path using dot notation for objects and [index] for arrays. Examples: "name", "user.email", "items[0]", "data.list[2].value"

value.description: The value to set at the specified path. Can be any valid JSON value (string, number, boolean, object, array, or null)
